mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT n.notice_code, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, g.gallery_title, g.gallery_content, r.r_title, r.r_content, p.sreview_content FROM admin_notice n LEFT JOIN gallery g ON n.notice_content = g.gallery_content LEFT JOIN review r ON n.notice_content = r.r_content LEFT JOIN place_review p ON n.notice_content = p.sreview_content ORDER BY n.notice_code DESC ) A ) admin_notice WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }
mapper.insert:
SELECT gallery_seq.nextval FROM dual

SELECT admin_notice_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT ALL INTO admin_notice (notice_code, notice_title, notice_content) VALUES (#{noticeCode }, #{noticeTitle }, #{noticeContent }) INTO gallery (gallery_no, gallery_title, gallery_content) VALUES (#{noticeCode }, #{noticeTitle }, #{noticeContent }) INTO review (r_id, r_title, r_content) VALUES (#{noticeCode }, #{noticeTitle }, #{noticeContent }) INTO place_review (sreview_no, sreview_content) VALUES (#{noticeCode }, #{noticeContent }) SELECT * FROM dual
INSERT INTO gallery_file ( photo_no, gallery_no, origin_name, stored_name) VALUES ( gallery_file_seq.nextval, #{galleryNo }, #{originName }, #{storedName } )
